original_text: Then the Jews asked Jesus, ‘What is your authority to do this? Do a miracle to show us that you really do have authority.’
korean_text: 이에 유대인들이 대답하여 예수께 말하기를 네가 이런 일을 행하니 무슨 표적을 우리에게 보이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: What is your authority to do this?
Do a miracle to show us
that you really do have authority
